title: Containers
introduction: A container platform built to support the most secure, reliable and scalable environments.

section_highlights.title: IBM Cloud Code Engine
section_highlights.description: Use the fully managed, serverless platform to run your containerized workloads, including web apps, micro-services, event-driven functions, or batch jobs.

section_highlights.title: IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service
section_highlights.description: IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service creates a cluster of compute hosts and deploys highly available containers. A Kubernetes cluster lets you securely manage the resources that you need to quickly deploy, update and scale applications.

section_highlights.title: Red Hat OpenShift for IBM Cloud
section_highlights.description: OpenShift developers have a fast and secure way to containerize and deploy enterprise workloads in Kubernetes clusters.

section_highlights.title: IBM Cloud Container Registry
section_highlights.description: Store and share your container images with users in your IBM Cloud account.
